page.title: 03Education:Primary School
page.content: Langwathby School is a large primary school with a nursery. We have 175 children and 8 teachers.It has been an area school for twelve years. Children from thirteen different villages come to our school because smaller schools have closed. Most of them travel by special bus,some of them come by car or walk. Edenhall school closed before Langwathby school was extended so they had to go to Penrith. Parents are always welcome to help at school in various ways, hearing reading, backing books, helping with needlework, craft, art and classifying the library. They help to raise funds for extra equip- ment and activities. It is a church of England school. The vicar comes and takes an assembly every week and stays to teach the upper juniors. We all have to go to secondary school in Penrith when we are eleven.
